attack announce:
A massive cave rat comes out from behind a rock, rushing towards you!

The gray furred creature blends in with the surroundings, but now that it is intent to do you harm it is quite obvious. Long, powerful teeth remind you of the countless bites you've suffered over the years. But as much as it might want to eat you, you know from experience how delicious it can be as well.
hunt announce:
You find a massive cave rat hiding among the rocks. The gray fur serves well as camoflage, but now that you've gotten close enough the game of hide and seek is over.

Now it's time for a game of eat or be eaten.
